data_variables.name: L
data_variables.description: A list used in function select_second to return the second element.

data_variables.name: teams
data_variables.description: A list containing lists of team members including coach and captain, used in losing_team_captain.

data_variables.name: racers
data_variables.description: A list of racer names used in the purple_shell function to swap first and last places.

data_variables.name: lengths
data_variables.description: A list holding predicted lengths of various lists.

data_variables.name: arrivals
data_variables.description: A list indicating the order of party attendees, used in fashionably_late function.

data_flow.creation_method: Local variable in the select_second function.
data_flow.flow: Used to check and return the second element of the list.

data_flow.creation_method: Local variable in the losing_team_captain function.
data_flow.flow: Used to access the last team's captain's name.

data_flow.creation_method: Local variable in the purple_shell function.
data_flow.flow: Modified to swap the first and last racer names.

data_flow.creation_method: Local variable in the length check.
data_flow.flow: Used to store predictions for lengths of multiple lists.

data_flow.creation_method: Local variable to demonstrate arrivals to a party.
data_flow.flow: Used in fashionably_late to determine if a guest is considered late.
